EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Global-FoundryView ({!Contact.Login_Id__c})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings!
GLOBALFOUNDRIES has rolled out a new version of FoundryView known as “Global-FoundryView” at https://www.global-foundryview.com. Please click on the link to access the portal.
You may log in to Global-FoundryView with your current login ID {!Contact.Login_Id__c} and password.
In the new portal, please navigate to “Supplier Service” which you may find the Training Materials to get you started.
If you need any additional assistance, you may contact your GLOBALFOUNDRIES representative or email us at global-foundryview_support@globalfoundries.com.
The Global-FoundryView Team from GLOBALFOUNDRIES
